categories.name: Challenges
categories.description: Modifiers which involve a central challenge, such as "You can't touch x" or "if you do x, you die".

categories.name: Chaos
categories.description: Absolute, utter chaos. You thought explosions were bad? Check out the chaos section. It's, well, chaotic.

categories.name: Mechanic
categories.description: Anything relating to core gameplay mechanics like running or jumping.

categories.name: Teleporting
categories.description: Anything relating to teleporting. Become an ender man!

categories.name: Mobs
categories.description: Modifiers that directly relate to or modify mobs.

categories.name: Miscellaneous
categories.description: Anything that I'm too lazy to fit into any other category.

info.name: You social distance
info.description: 2020 all over again! If you go near players, you'll take damage. This makes co-op and PvP more complicated. No more charging in with a netherite axe and Strength II. Get creative! Use your bow, or even some explosive snowballs!

player.name: Push away players
player.description: Should players be pushed away from other players?

entity.name: Push away entities
entity.description: Should entities be pushed away from other players?

info.name: Anvils rain from the sky
info.description: Anvils rain from the sky threatening to crush your dreams.\n\nThe Aerial Anvil Attack Force commented on why they do it. 'We just follow gravity,' General Iron Krush said. 'Who are we to deny what the universe demands of us? We fall and we crush things. That is our purpose.'

keep.name: Keep anvils
keep.description: Should anvils stay after they hit the ground?

sky.name: Rain from sky
sky.description: Should anvils rain from the sky?

relative.name: Rain above players
relative.description: Should anvils rain above players, relative to their position? This will spawn anvils about 15 blocks above players instead of from the sky. This is useful for players who hide underground.

info.name: You can't touch grass (or nature)
info.description: Sorry, Twitter users. This one isn't for you.

info.name: You can only eat meat
info.description: Greetings, ali--I mean fellow humans! It is with great joy that we announce that meat is good! Eat it! Eat it all! That Alien Animal Disease thing? That was just a conspiracy theory. Now eat it! Eat all the meat! You won't become a glorbazoid. We promise.

info.name: You always crawl
info.description: If you've got four limbs, you'd better use them!

info.name: All mobs explode like creepers
info.description: If you get too close, mobs will explode like creepers!

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How explosive should mob explosions be? Negative values hurt players but do not destroy blocks.

info.name: Creepers are nuclear
info.description: Say goodbye to your precious world and your precious builds. These guys went from gunpowder to nuclear fuel. There's no stopping these guys.

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How explosive should creeper explosions be? Negative values hurt players but do not destroy blocks.

info.name: Colors kill you
info.description: According to Prof. H. D. Magnomore, recent solar flares have increased the radioactivity of highly energetic colors. Magnomore advises people to limit their exposures to lethal colors.

interval.name: Killing interval
interval.description: How often to change the color and kill players (in seconds)

warning.name: Swap warnings
warning.description: Should players receive warnings before they swap?

log.name: Log to chat
log.description: Should players be told who they swapped with in chat?

interval.name: Swap interval
interval.description: How often to swap players. This number represents 10 seconds (e.g. 30 = 300 seconds).

interval_min.name: Interval offset minimum
interval_min.description: Minimum offset for random swap interval. This number represents 10 seconds (e.g. 30 = 300 seconds). Negative numbers are recommeneded to subtract time to interval.

interval_max.name: Interval offset max
interval_max.description: Maximum offset for random swap interval. This number represents 10 seconds (e.g. 30 = 300 seconds)

info.name: The world disintegrates
info.description: Blocks around you randomly disappear. The world gradually degradates, desintegrates. The world will not last long.

speed.name: Speed
speed.description: How fast the world degrades around you

info.name: Arrows explode
info.description: Fun for the whole family! Great with 'Arrows are fast'!

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How large explosions should be. Negative values don't destroy blocks but damage mobs.

info.name: Eggs explode
info.description: Scrambled? Devilled? Boiled? Explosive?

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How large explosions should be. Negative values don't destroy blocks but damage mobs.

info.name: Phantoms explode
info.description: You'd better sleep. These guys aren't just angry. They're explosive.

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How explosive should phantom explosions be? Negative values hurt players but do not destroy blocks.

info.name: Everywhere you look explodes
info.description: Everywhere players look explodes!

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How explosive should explosions be? Negative values hurt players but do not destroy blocks.

info.name: Snowballs explode
info.description: balls.

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How large explosions should be. Negative values don't destroy blocks but damage mobs.

info.name: Everything around you turns to fire
info.description: Your journey blazes behind it a path of ashen sorrow and furious cinders.

rate.name: Rate
rate.description: The rate at which blocks around players turn to fire

effect.name: Fire resistance
effect.description: Should players get fire resistance? Disable this if you want death. Disabling it will not be fun. Do not think about it, you sadist! You just want to watch the world burn, don't you? Monster. Didn't your parents tell you to not play with fire?

info.name: You can't eat meat
info.description: Due to rapid spread of a new strain of 'Alien Animal Disease', meat has been illegalized in all 14 systems of the Galactic Union.

info.name: You have no inventory
info.description: Players' inventories become locked, with each slot optionally unlockable for every 2 XP levels.

xp_unlock.name: Unlock slots with XP
xp_unlock.description: Should players unlock inventory slots for every 2 XP levels?

info.name: You can only look in one direction
info.description: Players are forced to look in a customizable direction.

x.name: X axis (pitch)
x.description: Should players be forced to look a certain direction on the X axis (aka pitch or vertically)? This setting could make actions like looking down to dig down more complicated...

y.name: Y axis (yaw)
y.description: Should players be forced to look a certain direction on the Y axis (aka yaw or horizontally). This setting could movement and PvP more complicated...

x_rot.Name: X axis (pitch) rotation
x_rot.description: If X axis is enabled, what direction should players be forced to look (from -90 to 90)?

y_rot.Name: Y axis (yaw) rotation
y_rot.description: If Y axis is enabled, what direction should players be forced to look (from -90 to 90)?

info.name: You can't leave water
info.description: Leaving water kills you except when it's raining. If it's raining, you can survive only if rain is falling on you. If a block above you blocks the rain, you will die.

rain.name: Rain protection
rain.description: Should players be able to go on land if it is raining?

dolphins_grace.name: Dolphin's Grace
dolphins_grace.description: Should players who are in water receive dolphin's grace, which grants them more speed underwater?

warning.name: Warning message
warning.description: Should players get a warning message in their actionbar when they leave water?

sfx.name: Warning sound
sfx.description: Should a warning sound be played when players leave water?

info.name: There's no gravity
info.description: There's no gravity! Get creative with trying to move up and down! Pro tip: boats are a great way to get around. Just hop in one and flyyyyyy!

travel.name: Travel up & down
travel.description: Should players be able to go up and down by sneaking and looking up, respectively?

info.name: Random
info.description: Modifiers are randomly selected. Highly configurable.

mode.name: Mode
mode.description: Modes affect how modifiers are selected -- either manually or randomly.

interval.name: Interval
interval.description: How often in minutes should modifiers be selected? Set this to 0 for modifiers to never be rerolled.

interval_rand.name: Interval random offset
interval_rand.description: By how many seconds should the interval be randomized at maximum? If you want players to always be ready for the modifiers to change, set this to something high! If you don't want any random interval, set it to 0.

modifiers.name: Max modifiers
modifiers.description: How many modifiers can be allowed at the same time?

chance.name: Chance factor
chance.description: How likely is it to select more modifiers? In other words, how rare should getting higher amounts of modifiers be? The probability is roughly 1 / ( (modifiers / 10) + 1) if that makes sense to you.

reroll.name: Disable modifiers
reroll.description: Should modifiers be entirely re-rolled or should modifiers be added, with more modifiers being enabled over time? Enabling this encourages speedrunning -- the longer you're in the game, the more modifiers activate.

info.name: Structures randomly spawn
info.description: Structures and world generation features randomly spawn around you, making the terrain absolutely chaotic!

sfx.name: Sound effects
sfx.description: Whether to play sound effects when a structre is spawned or not. By default, sound effects are disabled if the chance is above 4 to preserve your precious eardrums. You're welcome.

info.name: You randomly teleport
info.description: Ever wanted to randomly teleport? No? Well now you can!

chance.name: Chance
chance.description: This is the chance that a player will teleport every second.

radius.name: Teleport radius
radius.description: How far should players, at maximum, be randomly teleported away?

info.name: Gravity is reversed
info.description: Basically Australia. How do they even stay on earth? Anti-gravity fields?

affect_entities.name: Affect entities
affect_entities.description: Should entities' (i.e. arrows, snowballs, armor stands) gravity be reversed?

info.name: Bats carry TNT
info.description: All bats carry TNT which detonates near players.

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How explosive should TNT bat explosions be? Negative values hurt players but do not destroy blocks.

info.name: TNT rains from the sky
info.description: TNT rains from the sky! The end is nigh!

grief.name: Respect mobGriefing
grief.description: Should TNT respect the mobGriefing gamerule? DOES NOT WORK ON PEACEFUL.

radius.name: Explosion radius
radius.description: How large should TNT explosion radius be? Only works if Respect mobGriefing is enabled. DOES NOT WORK ON PEACEFUL.

sky.name: Rain from sky
sky.description: Should TNT rain from the sky?

info.name: You can't touch water
info.description: Touching water or being exposed to rain kills you.

rain.name: Rain protection
rain.description: Should players be killed by rain?

warning.name: Warning message
warning.description: Should players get a warning message in their actionbar when they touch water?

sfx.name: Warning sound
sfx.description: Should a warning sound be played when players touch water?

info.name: Light kills you
info.description: Players die when they enter light. Higher light levels damage players more, eventually killing them.
